channel.title: Posts on Karuppiah's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Karuppiah's Blog

item.title: My First Post!
item.description: Now that you are reading this post, it means I finally created another blog and hosted it too 😛 Yay! 🎉 My previous blogs that I hosted using Blogger during college - https://semlabs.blogspot.com/ https://semlectures.blogspot.com/ And now I have created this blog. I use these to create and host it: Hugo static site generator GitHub Pages Visual Studio Code Editor Markdown Emoji to put the awesome emojis in markdown 😁 Hoping to write tons of posts 😉 Stay tuned!
